1: Praise ye the everlasting. (Halleluya.) O PRAISE the LORD in his Sanctuary, praise him in the firmament of his power.
2: Praise him in his noble acts, praise him in his excellent greatness.
3: Praise him in the sound of the trumpet, praise him upon the lute and harp.
4: Praise him in the cymbals and dance, praise him upon the strings and pipe.
5: Praise him upon the well tuned cymbals, praise him upon the loud cymbals.
6: Let every thing that hath breath, praise the LORD. Praise the everlasting. (Halleluya.) [The end of the Psalter.]
